title: chogaths q hit box is alot smaller then the animation
body: when you do chogaths q the marker comes up you place it, then press q again to do cho's q, but even when enemy players are in the circle the fuking move still misses, why am i the only one to notice it, its actually hit box is smaller then the marker and animation, but what does riot do to fix it. fuk all, with brands piller of flame move his circle flame attack, even if your on th outside of the circle he stills does damage, its fuking bullshit, brands moves hit box is bigger then the animation, and chogaths hitbox is smaller then the animation, but i seriosuly doubt riot will ever care to fix it, they only adjust the game to suit them

replies.body: No the animation circle is old. It creates the ring, champions on the edge will not be hit due to the system Api not recognising champions who have been standing there

No it's actually really accurate to the circle, the thing you might be noticing is that the Animation looks bigger for a few reasons.

1. The animation goes off AFTER the move has calculated where people are (this is true of Cho's silence as well).
2. The animation goes into the air, so it's possible you're expecting to hit people that are slightly above the animation.
